apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji, as seen on Apple devices, captures a romantic kiss between two men, one with a rich medium-dark skin tone and the other with a deep dark skin tone. Apple’s expertise in realistic lighting and smooth gradients brings a warm, affectionate glow to their faces, with soft rounded edges defining their features. The subtle blush and gentle embrace, rendered with Apple’s signature 3D shading, convey a powerful sense of love and intimacy, making it a heartfelt expression of romantic connection.
